I’m a Junior (eleventh grade) and I just finished Freshmen (ninth grade) Language Arts. :P[/quote]

Don’t feel bad. I failed 9th grade Language Arts, and couldn’t take it until my senior year as an online class.

item.title: How to add spec restore?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498825.msg3648047#msg3648047 date=1309534769]

Just think of it as a repayment for all the times you’ve corrected me.

I don’t understand why a lot of people (mostly Americans) feel that it’s “wrong” to correct someone. That it will “hurt their feelings”. I don’t correct people to hurt their feelings, because I don’t care about their feelings. I do it so that they will be more educated in the future. For example, if you were to go to France and order a sandwhich du jambone (or, a ham sandwhich) and you didn’t pronounce it right. The cashier would correct you on the right way to say it, and you’d both be on your way. However in America, if someone to pronounce your name incorrectly, most people would go beta and just accept the new pronunciation for that class, because they don’t want to “hurt” the teacher’s feelings.

Corrections aren’t bad ^_^, in fact without corrections, we’d probably all be dumbfucks.
[/quote]Countries are proper nouns. Capitalize them. ;)[/quote]

YOU ASSHOLE! WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE CORRECTING ME LIKE THAT?

/joke

Thanks. Although, when I was going to school, we never talked about proper nouns, or things of the like. I didn’t know what a preposition was until high school >.>

Read full topic

item.title: How to add spec restore?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:8, topic:401767”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498825.msg3648055#msg3648055 date=1309535063]

Just think of it as a repayment for all the times you’ve corrected me.

I don’t understand why a lot of people (mostly Americans) feel that it’s “wrong” to correct someone. That it will “hurt their feelings”. I don’t correct people to hurt their feelings, because I don’t care about their feelings. I do it so that they will be more educated in the future. For example, if you were to go to france and order a sandwhich du jambone (or, a ham sandwhich) and you didn’t pronounce it right. The cashier would correct you on the right way to say it, and you’d both be on your way. However in America, if someone to pronounce your name incorrectly, most people would go beta and just accept the new pronunciation for that class, because they don’t want to “hurt” the teacher’s feelings.

Corrections aren’t bad ^_^, in fact without corrections, we’d probably all be dumbfucks.

indeed. But well, you just feel dumb when someone corrects you

@on topic
Wouldn’t it be just something like.

case <potion item id>: special += <amount you want> break;

That doesn’t put a time limit on the action.
[/quote]
In delta u can just add to playerhandler.java.
public int specrestoreTime = 30;

and then search for pcwaittimer
and there should be something if pcwaittimer > 0
pcwaittimer -= 1;

then u can make something like specrestoreTimer > 0
specrestore -= 1;

idk if it is the same on pi.[/quote]

But then you add another block of code to the public boolean process().

The easiest I would say is my suggestion. A long that holds the last time the restore was used, then if they try to use it again, then process as normal, set the old time to the current time.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add spec restore?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498361.msg3644484#msg3644484 date=1309278853]

long lastHealed;
// ...
public void handleButtonClick(final int id) {
    switch (id) {
        // ...
        case yourButtonId:
            final deltaTime = (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastHealed) / 1000;
            if (deltaTime >= 60) {// if at least 60 seconds have passed
                setHealth(levels[Skill.HIT_POINTS.getId()]);// Set health to max
                lastHealed = System.currentTimeMillis();
            }
            else {
                sendMessage("You must wait " + deltaTime + " seconds before you can use this again.");
            }
            break;
    }
}

[/quote]I do believe you forgot the datatype of ‘deltaTime’ :P[/quote]

oshit >.> <.<

You must be killed…

Read full topic

item.title: How to add spec restore?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

My suggestion would be to do something like this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498361.msg3644484.html#msg3644484

Essentially, declaring a variable that holds the time of the last time the restore was used. Then, when you click it again, check if the deltaTime is greater than the amount of time you want to pass. If it is, then restore, if not then sendMessage(“You need to wait " + (deltaTime / 1000) + " seconds before doing that action.”);

Read full topic

item.title: How to add spec restore?
item.dc:creator: @mrplumb mrplumb
item.description:
@mrplumb wrote:

Hey all i want to add spec restore to my anti posion
here is the code for antiposion

/** * Drink AntiPosion Potions * @param itemId The itemId * @param itemSlot The itemSlot * @param newItemId The new item After Drinking * @param healType The type of poison it heals */ public void potionPoisonHeal(int itemId, int itemSlot, int newItemId, int healType) { c.attackTimer = c.getCombat().getAttackDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); if(c.duelRule[5]) { c.sendMessage("Potions has been disabled in this duel!"); return; } if(!c.isDead && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay > 2000) { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemId, 1, itemSlot)) { c.sendMessage("You drink the "+c.getItems().getItemName(itemId).toLowerCase()+"."); c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); // Actions if(healType == 1) { //Cures The Poison } else if(healType == 2) { //Cures The Poison + protects from getting poison again } c.startAnimation(0x33D); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, itemSlot, 1); c.getItems().addItem(newItemId, 1); requestUpdates(); } } }

but i also only want the person to be able to drink the potion every 30 seconds

thanks

Read full topic
